metadata.Title: CVE-2016-8625 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: curl before version 7.51.0 uses outdated IDNA 2003 standard to handleInternational Domain Names and this may lead users to potentially andunknowingly issue network transfer requests to the wrong host.

criterions.comment: curl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
